com.github.kingamajick.admp.maven
Class ProcessBitmapResourcesMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.github.kingamajick.admp.maven.ProcessBitmapResourcesMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContextEnabled, Mojo
public class ProcessBitmapResourcesMojo
extends AbstractMojo

Copies all files with the extension ('.png', '.jpg', '.gif') from any defined resource directories to '${project.build.outputDirectory}/res'. Only files contained in the following directories will be considered:

  • ldpi
  • mdpi
  • hdpi
  • xhdpi
  • nodpi
  • tvdpi
Any files contained within sub directories of the above will have their name created from their path. For example /${subDir1}/${subDir2}/${imageFileName} will be named ${subDir1}_${subDir2}_${imageFileName}. All names will be in lower case.

Author:
R King
